description: Today's Chip of the Day is inspired by Colombia cuisine: Arepas. Born on this day, 1980 - Dian Rueda, a Colombian actress and model known for her roles in telenovelas.

Event: "The Last Day of Kwanzaa (African Americans)" | Chip: "Peanut Butter Caramel"
 "Marking the final day of the seven-day celebration of African American heritage, these Peanut Butter Caramel chips embody the richness and warmth of Kwanzaa's principles.
event_name: The last day of Kwanzaa (African Americans)

description:
Event: "Last Day of the Year or Bispers ng Bagong Tan (Philippines)" | Chip: "Adobo"
 "Marking the transition between Rizal Day and New Year's Eve, this festive celebration in the Philippines is all about Adobo  a beloved national dish.
event_name: Last Day of the Year or Bisperás ng Bagong Taón, special holiday between Rizal Day and New Year's Day (Philippines)
